name: Kids Multi-Vitamin Face Wash
about: What it is:A cleanser for kids’ skincare needs, formulated with MegaVitamin Complex™ to gently clear buildup in pores and balance skin..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Pores, Acne and Blemishes, and Oiliness.Highlighted Ingredients:- MegaVitamin Complex™: Combination of amino acids and omegas to protect, hydrate, and soothe skin..Ingredient Callouts:This product is gluten-free and vegan..What Else You Need to Know:Help your child put their best face forward with clean, balanced skin. This hydrating face cleanser is infused with vitamins and amino acids to balance oiliness, clear breakouts, and improve skin’s moisture barrier. It’s suitable for sensitive skin and can be used by the whole family..Clinical Results:Based on a consumer study of 75 participants:.- 96% agreed hydrated skin
ingredients: -MegaVitamin Complex™: Combination of amino acids and omegas to protect, hydrate, and soothe skin..-Hyaluronic Acid: Visibly plumps dry skin by attracting and sealing in moisture. .-Sunflower Extract: Promotes a strong skin barrier and is recommended by dermatologists and the World Health Organization...Water (Aqua), Coco-Glucoside, Glycerin, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, 1,2 Hexanediol, Sodium Lauroyl Oat Amino Acids, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Liquid Endosperm, Hydroxyacetophenone, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Juice, Lactococcus Ferment Lysate, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Ceramide NP, Ascorbic Acid, Linoleic Acid, Linolenic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Inulin, Fructose, Panthenol, Niacinamide, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Lactate, Sucrose Stearate,.Citric Acid, Benzoic Acid, Fragrance (Parfum)......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Pump wash into hand and massage onto wet skin. .-Rinse well and pat dry. .-Follow with Kids Multi-Vitamin Face Cream (sold separately). Now they’re ready to take on the world. .-Formulated for children ages four and up but can be used by the whole family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My daughter instantly had dry patches on her face after using Ever Eden face wash and cream.  She was disappointed to say the least.  You would think for the cost it would be gentler on skin.
